name: InView

unions.name: Msg
unions.comment: A message type for the state to update.

unions.name: State
unions.comment: Keeps track of viewport position, viewport dimensions and element positions.

values.name: addElements
values.comment: Add elements you'd like to be able to detect after you've initialized the state.

values.name: check
values.comment:
True if the element is in the current viewport.

![check](https://rl-king.github.io/elm-inview-example/illustrations/inView.svg)

values.name: checkAlt
values.comment:
True if the element is in _or_ above the current viewport.

![checkAlt](https://rl-king.github.io/elm-inview-example/illustrations/inViewAlt.svg)

values.name: checkAltWithOffset
values.comment:
True if the element is in _or_ above the current viewport but with an x and y offset.
A positive offset will make the viewport smaller and vice versa.

![checkAltWithOffset](https://rl-king.github.io/elm-inview-example/illustrations/inViewAltWithOffset.svg)
values.type: String.String -> Basics.Float -> Basics.Float -> InView.State -> Maybe.Maybe Basics.Bool

values.name: checkWithOffset
values.comment:
True if the element is in the current viewport but with an x and y offset.
A positive offset will make the viewport smaller and vice versa.

![checkWithOffset](https://rl-king.github.io/elm-inview-example/illustrations/inViewWithOffset.svg)
values.type: String.String -> Basics.Float -> Basics.Float -> InView.State -> Maybe.Maybe Basics.Bool

values.name: init
values.comment: Takes the list of element ids you want to keep track of.

values.name: subscriptions
values.comment: Subscribes to browser resize events and recalculates element positions.

values.name: update
values.comment: Update viewport size and element positions.

values.name: updateViewportOffset
values.comment:
Update current viewport x and y offset. Use this function to update the viewport
scroll position.
